name: funny slug game (ludum dare 48)
description:
this is a quick little game i made for the ludum dare 48 game jam. it was made in gb studio. i'm really happy with the art but i dont love the gameplay. i might come back and finish this game someday. I wanted to add enemies and a key system for the doors but i ran out of time. thanks for playing! I made everything except the fonts and music (songs i used were Ruiz_Pause_Underground and Ruiz_Gonaspace which are included by default in gb studio.)

CONTROLS!

Up - Up Arrow / W  

Down - Down Arrow / S  

Left - Left Arrow / A  

Right - Right Arrow / D  

A - Alt / Z / J  

B - Ctrl / K / X  

Start - Enter  

Select - Shift  

link to rate on the ld website
